Comment: For years they stood in front of Biden and said he’s sharp as a tack, at the top of his game, intellectually at the best in his lifetime.   Now they think they get to call out denials from Biden and his comrades?    After gaslighting the nation and the entire planet for years?  Now they get to try and heave like Biden pulled a fast one and tricked them into believing he wasn’t experiencing clear dementia?
Author: cliffotn
